mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Senator John Davison (Jay) Rockefeller IV Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Senator Rockefeller speaking in one of the Senate buildings at a press conference for Staggers Rail Reform
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Senate Photographic Studio
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller speaks behind a podium at a press event for the Staggers Rail Reform in a Senate building. Congressmen Nick Rahall and Bob Wise stand behind him with who appear to be Lane Bailey, Rockefeller's State Director, and Tim Gay, Rockefeller's Press Secretary.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rahall, Nick J, 1949
Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
Wise, Robert E, 1948
digital images
mdRecord.dcterms:source: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller IV papers, West Virginia & Regional History Center, West Virginia University Libraries
